verses.verse: Paul called <S%G2822><s%> to be an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and Sosthenes <S%G4988><s%> our brother, <S%G80><s%>

To the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth, <S%G2882><s%> to them that are sanctified <S%G37><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G2822><s%> to be saints, <S%G40><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> that in every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> call <S%G1941><s%> on the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord, <S%G2962><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> their's and our's: <S%G2257><s%>
Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and from the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I thank <S%G2168><s%> my God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> on <S%G4012><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> behalf, <S%G4012><s%> for the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> you by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>
That in every <S%G3956><s%> thing you are enriched <S%G4148><s%> by him, in all <S%G3956><s%> utterance, <S%G3056><s%> and in all <S%G3956><s%> knowledge; <S%G1108><s%>
Even <S%G2531><s%> as the testimony <S%G3142><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> was confirmed <S%G950><s%> in you:

So <S%G5620><s%> that you come <S%G5302><s%> behind <S%G5302><s%> in no <S%G3367><s%> gift; <S%G5486><s%> waiting <S%G553><s%> for the coming <S%G602><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%>

Who <S%G3739><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> confirm <S%G950><s%> you to the end, <S%G5056><s%> that you may be blameless <S%G410><s%> in the day <S%G2250><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> you were called <S%G2564><s%> to the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of his Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> by the name <S%G3686><s%> of our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that you all <S%G3956><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> thing, and that there be no <S%G3361><s%> divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you; but that you be perfectly <S%G2675><s%> joined <S%G2675><s%> together <S%G2675><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and in the same <S%G846><s%> judgment. <S%G1106><s%>
For it has been declared <S%G1213><s%> to me of you, my brothers, <S%G80><s%> by them which are of the house of Chloe, <S%G5514><s%> that there are contentions <S%G2054><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you.

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> that every <S%G1538><s%> one of you said, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> of Paul; and I of Apollos; <S%G625><s%> and I of Cephas; <S%G2786><s%> and I of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
Is Christ <S%G5547><s%> divided? <S%G3307><s%> was Paul crucified <S%G4717><s%> for you? or <S%G2228><s%> were you baptized <S%G907><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of Paul?
I thank <S%G2168><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> that I baptized <S%G907><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of you, but Crispus <S%G2921><s%> and Gaius; <S%G1050><s%>
Lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G3387><s%> should say <S%G2036><s%> that I had baptized <S%G907><s%> in my <S%G1699><s%> own name. <S%G3686><s%>

And I baptized <S%G907><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the household <S%G3624><s%> of Stephanas: <S%G4734><s%> besides, <S%G3063><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> not whether <S%G1487><s%> I baptized <S%G907><s%> any <S%G1536><s%> other. <S%G243><s%>

For Christ <S%G5547><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> me not to baptize, <S%G907><s%> but to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel: <S%G2097><s%> not with wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of words, <S%G3056><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> should be made <S%G2758><s%> of none <S%G2758><s%> effect. <S%G2758><s%>

For the preaching <S%G3056><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> is to them that perish <S%G622><s%> foolishness; <S%G3472><s%> but to us which are saved <S%G4982><s%> it is the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I will destroy <S%G622><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of the wise, <S%G4680><s%> and will bring <S%G114><s%> to nothing <S%G114><s%> the understanding <S%G4907><s%> of the prudent. <S%G4908><s%>

Where <S%G4226><s%> is the wise? <S%G4680><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> is the scribe? <S%G1122><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> is the disputer <S%G4804><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world? <S%G165><s%> has not God <S%G2316><s%> made <S%G3471><s%> foolish <S%G3471><s%> the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world? <S%G2889><s%>

For after <S%G1894><s%> that in the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> by wisdom <S%G4678><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> not God, <S%G2316><s%> it pleased <S%G2106><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> by the foolishness <S%G3472><s%> of preaching <S%G2782><s%> to save <S%G4982><s%> them that believe. <S%G4100><s%>
For the Jews <S%G2453><s%> require <S%G154><s%> a sign, <S%G4592><s%> and the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> after wisdom: <S%G4678><s%>
But we preach <S%G2784><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> crucified, <S%G4717><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%> a stumbling block, <S%G4625><s%> and to the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> foolishness; <S%G3472><s%>

But to them which <S%G3588><s%> are called, <S%G2822><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and Greeks, <S%G1672><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> the foolishness <S%G3474><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is wiser <S%G4680><s%> than men; <S%G444><s%> and the weakness <S%G772><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is stronger <S%G2478><s%> than men. <S%G444><s%>

For you see <S%G991><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> calling, <S%G2821><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> how that not many <S%G4183><s%> wise <S%G4680><s%> men after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> mighty, <S%G1415><s%> not many <S%G4183><s%> noble, <S%G2104><s%> are called:

But God <S%G2316><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> the foolish <S%G3474><s%> things of the world <S%G2889><s%> to confound <S%G2617><s%> the wise; <S%G4680><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> the weak <S%G772><s%> things of the world <S%G2889><s%> to confound <S%G2617><s%> the things which are mighty; <S%G2478><s%>

And base <S%G36><s%> things of the world, <S%G2889><s%> and things which are despised, <S%G1848><s%> has God <S%G2316><s%> chosen, <S%G1586><s%> yes, and things which <S%G3588><s%> are not, to bring <S%G2673><s%> to nothing <S%G2673><s%> things that are:
That no <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> should glory <S%G2744><s%> in his presence. <S%G1799><s%>

But of him are you in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is made <S%G1096><s%> to us wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> and righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> and sanctification, <S%G38><s%> and redemption: <S%G629><s%>
That, according <S%G2531><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He that glories, <S%G2744><s%> let him glory <S%G2744><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
